FuncDef: This command assigns a conditional static MAC address entry to an SPBM B-VPLS SAP/spoke-SDP allowing external MACs for single and multi-homed operation.
CLIs: mac ieee-address [ create ] black-holemac ieee-address [ create ] sap <sap-id> monitor { fwd-status }
mac ieee-address [ create ] spoke-sdp <sdp-id:vc-id> monitor { fwd-status }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the static MAC address to an SPBM/sdp-binding interface. Values-6-byte mac-address (xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx) Cannot be all zeros..
Specifies the SDP identifier. Values-1 to 17407.
Specifies the virtual circuit identifier. Values-1 to 4294967295.
This keyword is mandatory while creating a static MAC.
Specifies that this static mac is based on the forwarding status of the SAP or spoke-SDP for multi-homed operation.
Specifies for TLS FDB entries defined on a local SAP the value 'sap', remote entries defined on an SDP have the value 'sdp'.
